definitions.definition: A quirk , idiosyncrasy , frailty , or mannerism ; an unusual habit that is slightly strange or silly.
examples: Try to look past his foibles and see the friendly fellow underneath.

definitions.definition: A weakness or failing of character .
Part of a sword between the middle and the point, weaker than the forte .

main_definition: ( chiefly in the plural ) A quirk , idiosyncrasy , frailty , or mannerism ; an unusual habit that is slightly strange or silly.
secondary_definitions: A weakness or failing of character .
( fencing ) Part of a sword between the middle and the point, weaker than the forte .
